name: Debra HARTMAN, The Fund for Animals, P.N.C Inc. and Patrice Amity-Haan and D. Scott Haan, H/W, Appellants, v. PENNSYLVANIA GAME COMMISSION, Vernon R. Ross, Michael Schmit, Calvin Dubrock, R. Boyd, W. Hutson, D. Overcash, M. Dubaich, T. Hardisky, and Matthew J. Lovallo, Appellees

parties: Debra HARTMAN, The Fund for Animals, P.N.C Inc. and Patrice Amity-Haan and D. Scott Haan, H/W, Appellants, v. PENNSYLVANIA GAME COMMISSION, Vernon R. Ross, Michael Schmit, Calvin Dubrock, R. Boyd, W. Hutson, D. Overcash, M. Dubaich, T. Hardisky, and Matthew J. Lovallo, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of July, 2003, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
828 A.2d 1006
Debra HARTMAN, The Fund for Animals, P.N.C Inc. and Patrice Amity-Haan and D. Scott Haan, H/W, Appellants, v. PENNSYLVANIA GAME COMMISSION, Vernon R. Ross, Michael Schmit, Calvin Dubrock, R. Boyd, W. Hutson, D. Overcash, M. Dubaich, T. Hardisky, and Matthew J. Lovallo, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 21, 2003.
